SEARCH
Module imagingbook.common
Package imagingbook.common.regions

Interface ContourTracer

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegionContourSegmentation
public interface ContourTracer
This interface defines the functionality of region segmentations that perform contour extraction.
Version:
2020/04/01

    Retrieves all inner contours of the associated region labeling.

    • getInnerContours

      List<Contour.Inner> getInnerContours()
      Retrieves all inner contours of the associated region labeling.
      Returns:
      the list of inner contours.

    • getInnerContours

      List<Contour.Inner> getInnerContours(boolean sort)
      Retrieves all inner contours of the associated region labeling.
      Parameters:
      sort - set true to sort contours by (descending) length.
      Returns:
      the list of inner contours.
